zachary.shapes

Class Shape2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • zachary.shapes.Shape
      • zachary.shapes.Shape2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ellipse, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shape2D
extends Shape
    This abstract class provides definitions for double precision geometric 2D shapes.
    Version:
    10/9/18
    Author:
    Zachary Wang

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class zachary.shapes.Shape

        x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape2D(double x, double y)
      This creates a 2D Shape object with x coordinate x and y coordinate y
      Shape2D(double x, double y, int strokeWeight)
      This creates a 2D Shape object with x coordinate x, y coordinate y, and a certain line thickness
      Shape2D(double x, double y, int[] fill)
      This creates a 2D Shape object with x coordinate x, y coordinate y, and a certain fill color
      Shape2D(double x, double y, int[] fill, int[] stroke, int strokeWeight)
      This creates a 2D Shape object with x coordinate x, y coordinate y, a fill color, a certain line thickness, and a certain line color

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape2D

        public Shape2D(double x,
               double y)
        This creates a 2D Shape object with x coordinate x and y coordinate y
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the shape
        y - y coordinate of the shape

      • Shape2D

        public Shape2D(double x,
               double y,
               int[] fill)
        This creates a 2D Shape object with x coordinate x, y coordinate y, and a certain fill color
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the shape
        y - y coordinate of the shape
        fill - the color of the shape
        Precondition:
        fill is an array of size 3 with red in the first index, blue in the second, and green in the third

      • Shape2D

        public Shape2D(double x,
               double y,
               int strokeWeight)
        This creates a 2D Shape object with x coordinate x, y coordinate y, and a certain line thickness
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the shape
        y - y coordinate of the shape
        strokeWeight - the thickness of the line
        Precondition:
        strokeWeight can not be negative

      • Shape2D

        public Shape2D(double x,
               double y,
               int[] fill,
               int[] stroke,
               int strokeWeight)
        This creates a 2D Shape object with x coordinate x, y coordinate y, a fill color, a certain line thickness, and a certain line color
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the shape
        y - y coordinate of the shape
        stroke - the color of the line
        strokeWeight - the thickness of the line
        fill - the color of the shape
        Precondition:
        stroke and fill are arrays of size 3 with red in the first index, blue in the second, and green in the third, strokeWeight can not be negative

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
        Prepares the shape ill color
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        p - the reference of the PApplet used
        Precondition:
        p must not be null, and appropriate settings should have been selected (color, fill, etc)

      • isPointInside

        public abstract boolean isPointInside(double x,
                                      double y)
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside this shape
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the point
        y - y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        true if the point x,y is contained inside, or on the border, of this shape
